title: MY ANGEL TOMB WARD SKIN
body: Hello Riot and people who care enough to read this post. Recently, I've been playing league with different ward skins. Im 200% sure I bought the Angel Tomb Ward skin, because i bought it to match my angel tomb icon. As I change skins, i realize ... ITS NOT THERE. WHERE COULD IT BE. IM TILTED. It was one of my favorite ward skins and it glitched on me. Please respond, this is an emergency.

replies.body: There was an issue where ward skins were showing up despite being unlocked on the account.  Are you still having this issue or is everything okay now?  Let me know!
Yes I've realized that the angel tomb ward skin was temporary for a year... correct me if I'm mistaken. I don't see the logic behind temporary skins {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Hey DeadLines,

It is currently a known issue, please read [this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/pOslJHiQ-knownward-skins-missing) thread for details.
